shots.description: Medium close-up shot of Nick Carraway, the camera positioned slightly low to capture his pensive expression. Soft, natural lighting casts shadows across his face, hinting at an inner conflict.
Over-the-shoulder shot, framing Nick in the foreground, with a blurred, out-of-focus background suggesting his isolation. The camera lingers, allowing the audience to study his thoughtful demeanor.
Close-up shot of Nick's eyes, the camera slowly pushing in to accentuate his introspective gaze. The lighting is subdued, casting a hint of melancholy over his features.
Wide shot, revealing Nick sitting alone in a dimly lit room. The camera slowly pans around him, emphasizing his solitude and the weight of his thoughts.
shots.dialogue: "I'm inclined to reserve all judgements, a habit that has opened up many curious natures to me and also made me the victim of not a few veteran bores."
